pages.text: The $(item)Alchemical Reaction Chamber$(), or ARC for short, can function as a $(thing)Furnace$(), offers a form of $(l:neovitae:utility/ore_processing)Ore-Tripling$(), can revert $(l:neovitae:altar/soul_network)Blood Orbs$(), $(item)Netherrite$() and $(item)Reinforced Runes$(), and is currently the only way to get $(blood)Weak Blood Shards$(), specifically from a $(l:neovitae:dungeons/tau_fruit)Saturated Tau$(). $(br)Most tools used within the ARC degrade over time, but can be enchanted with unbreaking or mending to compensate.

pages.heading: Sanguine Reverter
pages.text: The $(item)Sanguine Reverter$() is used to create $(blood)Weak Blood Shards$(), and revert $(l:neovitae:altar/soul_network)Blood Orbs$(), $(item)Netherrite$() and $(item)Reinforced Runes$() to their input crafting item.

pages.heading: Revert Reinforced Rune
pages.text: All Reinforced Runes can be reverted in this way - this is just a demonstration.

pages.heading: Automation
pages.text: Should you wish to automate the ARC, perhaps as part of an $(l:neovitae:utility/ore_processing)Ore-Tripling$() chain, you may want to know that it is $(thing)sided$(), much like a $(item)furnace$(). Tools can only be inserted or extracted from the top, inputs from the sides, and outputs from the bottom. Keep this in mind when placing your $(item)Hoppers$() or $(l:neovitae:demon_will/item_routing/routing_nodes)Routing Nodes$().
